name: Flipbook Catalog with Woocommerce
author: PluginJS

sections.description:
Creating a HTML5 (NO FLASH) Flipbook Catalog linked to your Woocommerce Products or any image has never been easier.

See Demo of Product Here and Flip Through the Book

Get the Pro Version With Wish List and More Functions Today

This plugin lets retailers or any one desiring a flipbook catalog to:

  • Create unlimited number of flip books.
  • Add unlimited number of of items to the flip book be they images or products from Woocommerce.
  • Select from 2 different page layouts – 1 image per page or 2 images per page (PRO VERSION HAS MORE LAYOUTS).
  • Allows to display items on both sides of the page or only on the left or right right side of page.
  • Design custom cover page for catalog.
  • Display item names and prices on product rollover.
  • Customize all elements of the book including a) background color or image, b) turn arrows, c) book frame.
  • Customize your own cover page.
  • Add borders and frames around each individual product.
  • Reorganize pages on a single edit screen.

Arbitrary section 1
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory or install via the WordPress plugins control panel.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to the Catalog post type
sections.faq:
Does Flipbook Catalog require Woocommerce?

No, Woocommerce simply allows the retailer to more easily add products to the page of the flipbook. It also allows for automatic display of item name and price. With the Pro Version, Woocommerce products can
be easily added to the Wish List.

Does the Flipbook book use Flash?
NO, we only use AJAX.

Can I control the page layout?
Yes, you can control how the items appear on the page including:

  • Number of items on a page. Up to 2 items per page on Free version and up to 4 items per page on Pro version.
  • Item frames allow you to frame an item so that it works well with your book background.
  • Display item name and price on page if you use Woocommerce.

Can I control the design of the catalog?
Yes, the catalog is highly customizable including all fonts and colors. Additionally, you can:

  • Set a unique background color or upload a background image.
  • Set and control the color and with of frame around book.
  • Create a custom cover page and informational left page.
  • Set custom turn page arrows.

short_description: Easily create an attractive Flipbook catalog linked to your Woocommerce products or any images.  Many custom design configurations.  No Flash.
